ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_ME.SUBTITLE: Hy there, I'm Zeljko! I'm passionate about coding, eager to learn new technologies, and constantly improving my skills
ABOUT_ME.LOCATION: Live in Cologne. Open to remote,hybrid and in-office work, and I'm flexible to adapt to different working environments.
ABOUT_ME.HEAD: I am open-minded and always enthusiastic about learning new technologies and continually improving my skills
ABOUT_ME.CHECK: My problem-solving approach is based on analytical thinking,creativity and persistence.I learn from every challenge and constantly aim to find solutions that are both efficient and elegant.I believe in collaboration and see each obstacle as an opportunity to improve and expand my skills

TECHNOLOGIES.TITLE: Skill Set
TECHNOLOGIES.CONTENT: I am dedicated developer focused on building modern,responsive web applications. As a motivated career changer, I have quickly build a solid foundation around component-based architecture and strong typing using the Angular ecosystem.I deliver clean,maintainable code,leveraging REST API integration and practical experience with Firebase. The rapid pace of web development excites me, continuous learning and adaptability are my top priorities, ensuring I quickly evolve into a valuable team contributor.
TECHNOLOGIES.INVITE: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Featured Projects
PROJECTS.SUBTITLE:
Explore a section of my work here - Interact with 
 projects to see my skills in action.

ITEMS.NAME: Join
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories

ITEMS.NAME: Sharky
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Game based on object-oriented approach.Help Sharky to get trough various enemies , find all coins and poisoned elixir to fight against the big crazy shark

CONTACT.HEAD: Contact me
CONTACT.TITLE: Let's work  together
CONTACT.QUESTION: Got a problem to solve?
CONTACT.CONTENT: I'm excited to help bring your ideas to life! Whether it's a project, a challenge, or a role you have in mind, I'd love to hear from you. Let's create something amazing together.

REFERENCES.HEADLINE: What my colleagues say about me

REFERENCE.NAME: Kyrylo Novikov
REFERENCE.TEXT: I had the pleasure of working with Zeljko on the “Join” Project  , and the collaboration was truly smooth and professional.His dedication, precision, and teamwork greatly contributed to the quality of the final product.

REFERENCE.NAME: André Zelmer
REFERENCE.TEXT: I worked with Zeljko on several projects. In the „Join“ project, he took over the area for managing tasks and delivered reliably. Technically very competent and absolutely uncomplicated as a person – that's exactly what you want in a team.

REFERENCE.NAME: Stefan Krischan
REFERENCE.TEXT: I collaborated with Zeljko on the  „Join“ project. His technical competence and strong team-oriented mindset consistently contributed to the success of our work.
